== Criticism ==
== Criticism ==
In November of 2006, the [[Microsoft]] and [[Novell]] software corporations announced a controversial partnership involving, among other things, patent protection for some customers of Novell under certain conditions.<ref>{{ cite web | title = Ars Technica article on the Microsoft-Novell patent deal | url = http://arstechnica.com/articles/columns/linux/linux-20070128.ars }}</ref>
